attributes.action: Stop Stafford Prison From Being A Exclusive Sex Offender Centre
attributes.additional_details: Stafford Prison is to become a national centre for sex offenders from April 2014. By October 2014 all of its 741 inmates will be sex offenders. The people of Stafford have not been consulted and the majority do not want this on their doorstep. Please sign this page so that we can tell the government that we are not accepting this and for this facility for sex offenders to be housed elsewhere.
